entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
